{{Description|Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.}}
'''Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Lucky Dog]].

==Description==
One who is favored by fortune can find priceless treasures in the most deadly of traps.<br />While wandering around some ruins, the boy known as Lucky Dog accidentally fell into a deep pit.<br />He landed safely on a pile of dust. It turned out to be a mattress that over the years had gradually broken down, eventually turning to dust.<br />Just like that, Lucky Dog discovered a treasure trove left by the old aristocrats. This circlet came to epitomize his luck.
